price: 78. Bendito sea el nombre de tu Señor, Dueño de la Majestad y del Honor.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
